message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CV, cs.SI

The paper deals with the task of online boosting, which is a machine learning technique. The most relevant sub-category for this paper is likely to be cs.LG (Machine Learning), as it deals with the design and analysis of algorithms that can learn from data. The paper also mentions the use of online convex programming, which falls under the sub-category cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of boosting for computer vision tasks, which falls under the sub-category cs.CV (Computer Vision). The paper also mentions the use of expert advice, which falls under the sub-category cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). Finally, the paper mentions the use of weak learners, which is a common concept in the sub-category cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
